fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Redirect all players from target A to target B and vice versa.
- (Rehearsal) Select two players to redirect them both to a third person, then rehearse.
- (Concert) Stalk a player and attack their target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- (Concert) You may select other Band members.
- **Rehearsal Radius:** 2
